p: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, single-center, phase IIb efficacy and safety trial was conducted at h-VIVO Services Ltd (London, UK). The study (ClinicalTrials.gov: NCT03180801, EudraCT: 2016-002134-74) was approved by UKâ€™s Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency and the North East-York Research Ethics Committee and registered on 8 June 2017. All participants signed informed consent, and the study was conducted in accordance with the provisions of the Declaration of Helsinki and Good Clinical Practice guidelines.
